name: 陳怡倩
objective: 本課程介紹語言教學與學習原則，語言習得理論，和語言習得領域重要研究發現。期能建立學生應用語言學知識與日後相關研究的基礎。課程涵蓋主要內容包括：母語習得理論與實踐、第二語言(外語)習得理論與實踐、母語習得與第二語言(外語)習得之相同與相異處、影響語言習得重要因素(情性因素與社會文化因素)、語言學習者策略、對比分析、錯誤分析、語言溝通能力、閱讀理論與實踐、 寫作理論與實踐。
schedule:
W 1 Course Introduction
W 2 Introduction to SLA
W 3 Age
W 4 Crosslinguistic influences
W 5 The linguistics environment I
W 6 The linguistics environment II
W 7 Cognition I
W8 Cognition II
W 9 Mid-term Exam
W 10 Review of Mid-term Exam
W 11 Learner Language Development I
W 12 Learner Language Development II
W 13 Foreign language aptitude
W 14 Motivation
W 15 Affect & individual differences
W 16 Social dimensions of L2 learning
W 17 Final exam
W 18 Final exam review
scorePolicy: Topic reflection & discussion (15%); topic presentations (20%); mid-term exam (30%); final exam (35%)
materials:
Ortega, Lourdes. (2009). Understanding second language acquisition. London, UK: Hodder.
